Uses of Interface
org.ow2.bonita.facade.identity.User

Packages that use User
org.ow2.bonita.facade Contains interfaces for accessing Bonita APIs. 
org.ow2.bonita.facade.identity.impl Contains classes defining identity entities (internal use only). 
org.ow2.bonita.facade.internal All interfaces in this package are for internal use only. 
org.ow2.bonita.facade.runtime.command Contains classes in order to work with Bonita console (internal use only). 
 

Uses of User in org.ow2.bonita.facade
 

Methods in org.ow2.bonita.facade that return User

          Create a new a user
 User IdentityAPI.findUserByUserName(java.lang.String username)
          Retrieve a user from its username
 User IdentityAPI.getUser(java.lang.String username)
          Deprecated. use IdentityAPI.findUserByUserName(String) instead
 User IdentityAPI.getUserByUUID(java.lang.String userUUID)
          Retrieve a user from its UUID
 User IdentityAPI.importUser(java.lang.String userUUID, java.lang.String username, java.lang.String passwordHash, java.lang.String firstName, java.lang.String lastName, java.lang.String title, java.lang.String jobTitle, java.lang.String managerUserUUID, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> profileMetadata)
          Import a user
 User IdentityAPI.updateUser(java.lang.String oldUsername, java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String firstName, java.lang.String lastName, java.lang.String email)
          Deprecated. use IdentityAPI.updateUserByUUID(String, String, String, String, String, String, String, Map) to update the user's info and use IdentityAPI.updateUserPassword(String, String) to change the user's password.
 User IdentityAPI.updateUserByUUID(java.lang.String userUUID, java.lang.String username, java.lang.String firstName, java.lang.String lastName, java.lang.String title, java.lang.String jobTitle, java.lang.String managerUserUUID, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> profileMetadata)
          Update a user
 User IdentityAPI.updateUserPassword(java.lang.String userUUID, java.lang.String password)
          Update the user's password.

          Retrieve all the users in a given role inside a group.

          Deprecated. use IdentityAPI.getAllUsers() instead
 java.util.List<User> IdentityAPI.getUsers(int fromIndex, int numberOfUsers)
          Retrieve a limited number of users (for paginated UI)

          Retrieve all the users having the same manager

 java.util.Set<User> IdentityAPI.getUsersInRole(java.lang.String roleName)
          Deprecated. use IdentityAPI.getAllUsersInRoleAndGroup(String, String) instead with the default group IdentityAPI.DEFAULT_GROUP_NAME
 java.util.List<User> IdentityAPI.getUsersInRole(java.lang.String roleUUID, int fromIndex, int numberOfUsers)
          Retrieve a limited number of the users in a role (for paginated UI)
